short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect2 enables you to click phone numbers on webpages to make a call with your mVoice VoIP service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect2 simplifies making phone calls by automatically converting phone numbers on web pages into links that will initiate a call using your mVoice VoIP service when clicked.

You may customize the Connect2 extension by specifying a whitelist or blacklist of web pages to highlight numbers on, and custom regular expressions for non-standard numbers.

Connect2 also provides easy access to the mVoice website, mVoice support and your mVoice call records.
